statement.p: A zero coupon bond with a term of 5 years and maturity value of 1000 is purchased. At the time the bond was purchased, the yield curve was s_0(1) = 2.5\%, s_0(2) = 3.5\%, s_0(3) = 4\%, s_0(4) = 4.25\%, and s_0(5) = 4.3\%.
Three years later, in the face of a possible recession, the yield curve inverts and \\ s_3(1) = 5.5\%, s_3(2) = 4.5\%, s_3(3) = 4\%, s_3(4) = 4.25\%, and s_3(5) = 5.35\%.
Compare the book and market values of the bond after three years and report the difference as a gain or a loss.
